thread.title: Giant Summer GK Crossword Special
thread.title_full: Giant Summer GK Crossword Special - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Giant Summer GK Crossword Special
text: Plus, to celebrate the publication of the fifth edition of the Chambers Thesaurus, the Telegraph is offering the chance for one lucky winner to scoop Â£500 and a copy of the new edition of the Chambers Thesaurus - and they will also receive the Chambers Dictionary, the Chambers Crossword Manual and the Chambers Complete Crossword Companion. On top of that, five runners-up will win copies of the new edition of the ChambersThesaurus as well as the Chambers Dictionary, the Chambers Crossword Manual and the Chambers Complete Crossword Companion. The Chambers Thesaurus is an essential aid for crossword setters and solvers, and anyone who is interested in word games. This fifth edition, new and updated for 2015, retains all the much-loved features of the Chambers Thesaurus, including more synonyms than any other English thesaurus. Follow @telegraph
